title: GoUnderDomTower
body:
[img]/assets/data-models/stories/20201000034_oracle_end/Utrechtbasilisk_1.png[/img]

[i]The Basilisk is hiding in the passage under the Dom Tower.[/i]

[i]The Basilisk sees you.[/i]

[i]It starts rattling its scales. [/i]

[i]It leans towards you, orienting its deadly gaze towards your face.[/i]

[i]A thunderstorm began to growl in its throat.[/i]
[[ Look |Death end]] [[ Avert your eyes |Continue]]

title: Death end
body:
[img]/assets/data-models/stories/20201000034_oracle_end/bertken.png[/img]
"You fool! You have doomed us all!"

[img]/assets/data-models/stories/20201000034_oracle_end/Utrechtbasilisk_1.png[/img]

[i]The Basilisk screams[/i]


"Can you hear it? 

The Basilisk is celebrating its victory."


[i]The Basilisk dances in victory.[/i]


[i]The rift opens, swallows everything in Utrecht, and spreads through the world.[/i]

"Congratulations, the world has ended because of you!"

[[ Oh No! I didn't look |Continue]]  [[Ok, fine by me |end game coward]]

title: GotoEnd2
body:
[img]/assets/data-models/stories/20201000034_oracle_end/bertken.png[/img]

"Congratulations Chosen One, you have saved Dom Square!

Here is your reward, this will be very useful for your next quest."

[img]/assets/data-models/stories/20201000034_oracle_end/rooster.png[/img]

 [[A rooster? Why?|pick up reward button]]  [[Next Quest? What do you mean?|pick up reward button]]

title: Use sun button
body:
[img]/assets/data-models/stories/20201000034_oracle_end/Utrechtbasilisk_1.png[/img]

[i]You take the Sun and put it in front of your face.[/i]

[i]The Basilisk jumps back with an angry snarl.[/i]

[i]But it is too late.[/i]

[i]His deadly power is transforming him into a statue.[/i]

[i]The statue shatters.[/i]

[i]The stone transforms into dust and is aspirated by the time rift.[/i]

[i]The rift slowly closes.[/i]

[i]The Basilisk is defeated.[/i]

[[Victory!|GotoEnd2]]

title: pick up reward button
body:
[img]/assets/data-models/stories/20201000034_oracle_end/bertken.png[/img]

"The Basilisk has been defeated at the Dom Square and part of the time rift has been closed,

but the stoney remains of the Basilisk have blown through the time rift into other parts of the city.

The rooster's crow is deadly to the Basilisk and the rooster will accompany you to your next quest.

Do you want to continue?" 


[[No thanks, I've had enough adventure.|end game coward]] [[Yes! Me and my rooster will save Utrecht again!|continue to next level]]

title: continue to next level
body:
[img]/assets/data-models/stories/20201000034_oracle_end/bertken.png[/img]

"A wise choice, Chosen One. Your next quest will take you to..."

Lombok
Overvecht
Museumkwartier
